sentences.en: A friend drove her to Atlanta, where she picked up a rental car.
sentences.cn: 一个朋友开车送她去了亚特兰大，在那里她租到了一辆车。

sentences.en: As the car rental industry polarizes, business will go to the bigger companies.
sentences.cn: 随着汽车租赁业的两极分化，生意将流向较大的公司。

sentences.en: I received a bill for the car rental from my credit card company.
sentences.cn: 我收到一张我的信用卡公司寄来的汽车租金账单。

sentences.en: I wrote a letter to the car rental agency, explaining what had happened.
sentences.cn: 我给租车行写了一封信说明发生的情况。

sentences.en: I've paid this month's television rental.
sentences.cn: 我已付了这个月的电视租金.

sentences.en: In the early 1990s, it was easy to get into the rental business.
sentences.cn: 20世纪90年代早期，进入租赁行业很容易。

sentences.en: It has been let at an annual rental of 393,000.
sentences.cn: 它以每年39.3万英镑的价格被租了出去。

sentences.en: Repairs and improvements can lead to higher rental rates.

sentences.cn: 电话费包括线路租用费。

sentences.en: The yearly rental of her house is 2400 yuan.
There are hefty charges across the board for one-way rental.
sentences.cn: 各处对单程租赁的收费都很高。

sentences.en: There is a kind of interesting services in Britain - rental services.
sentences.cn: 在英国租借服务中有一种很有趣的服务.

sentences.en: They traced the van to a New Jersey car rental agency.
sentences.cn: 他们查出面包车属于新泽西州的一家租车行。

sentences.en: This rental payment appropriates some of the consumer surplus.
sentences.cn: 这种租金付款占有了一些消费剩余.
录像带的租金通常是3英镑。

sentences.en: We can organise car rental from Chicago O'Hare Airport.
sentences.cn: 我们可以安排提供从芝加哥奥黑尔机场出发的租车服务。

sentences.en: We didn't worry because they were always so prompt with their rental payment.
sentences.cn: 我们不担心，因为他们交租金总是非常及时。

words.tran_cn: （法）年金，年收入；长期公债，公债利息
承租人；佃户；房东；（英）影片出租商

trans.tran_en: You use rental to describe things that are connected with the renting out of goods, properties, and services
the money that you pay to use a car, television, or other machine over a period of time
